snippet: A proposal would give the German government a direct stake in European Aeronautic Defense & Space equal to that of France, but also would dissolve an agreement that gave the two countries veto powers.
abstract: Board of European Aeronautic Defense & Space, parent company of Airbus, is soon expected to announce significant restructuring of its core shareholder base that will give  German government a direct stake in group on par with that of France; agreement would also end the two countries' effective veto power over company strategy.
lead_paragraph: A proposal would give the German government a direct stake in European Aeronautic Defense & Space equal to that of France, but also would dissolve an agreement that gave the two countries veto powers.

headline.main: Airbus Parent Expected to Alter Base of Its Investors
headline.print_headline: Revamping of Airbus Parent May End Veto Powers of France and Germany

keywords.value: European Aeronautic Defense and Space Co
keywords.name: organizations
